feed.title: Heri's Dev Notes
feed.subtitle: Welcome to 'Heri's Dev Notes' - a personal diary of a developer's journey. This site is a treasure trove of insights, experiences, and reflections gathered along my path in the tech world. From the first lines of code to complex projects, I document the highs and lows, the learning curves, and the eureka moments. Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting out, join me in exploring the ever-evolving landscape of technology.
